Package machinelearninggui

Class View

java.lang.Object
machinelearninggui.View
public class View extends Object
This class operates as the view of the MVC Design pattern. It is used to present information to the user and accepts user input which is passed to the controller.
Since:
20/03/2022

    • getQuestion

      public JLabel getQuestion()

      Gets the question label, so it can be modified by the controller.

      Returns:
      the address of the question label.

    • getButtons

      public List<JButton> getButtons()

      Gets all the button elements to be used for the question screen.

      Returns:
      the list of all buttons on the question screen.

    • addButton

      public void addButton(JButton button)

      A setter function which adds a new button to the UI.

      Parameters:
      button - the button you wish to add, used by the controller.

    • getResultScreen

      public JPanel getResultScreen()

      Returns the result screen which is modified by the controller.

      Returns:
      the address of the resultScreen.

    • getResultLabel

      public JLabel getResultLabel()

      Returns the results label, so it can be modified by the controller.

      Returns:
      the address of the JLabel so it can be modified.

    • getResultConcept

      public JLabel getResultConcept()

      The result concept label is used to modify the concept of the dataset on the UI.

      Returns:
      the address of the JLabel so it can be modified by the controller.
